subject: Plant Watering Instructions
content:
Hi Manager,

Here are the rules for watering the plants: We need to water the plants two days each week.

Your coordination is appreciated.

Best regards,
Owner

subject: Plant Watering - one more thing
content:
Hi Manager,

Another thing: it is not healthy for the plants to water them on consecutive days.
So we need to water them two days each week, but they should not be consecutive.

Your coordination is appreciated.

Best regards,
Owner

subject: Updated Hours of Operation
content:
Hi Manager,

I hope you're doing well. Given the ongoing staffing challenges, we've made some adjustments to our operating hours. Here's the new schedule:

• Closed on Sundays.
• Lunch service only on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays.
• Dinner service only on Wednesdays, Fridays, and Saturdays.

Please communicate these changes to the team at your earliest convenience.
Thanks for your understanding.

Best regards,
Owner

subject: Important: Plant Watering and Floor Polishing
content:
Hi Manager,

I just remembered, we need to avoid plant watering and floor polishing on the same day.
It is very important to prevent any interference between the water and the polish.

Thanks for your attention to detail.

Best regards,
Owner

subject: Lunch specials
content:
Hi Manager,

I was thinking, maybe we should change up some of the lunch specials. I went to a restaurant down the block that has a preset lunch menu (starter, entrée, plus a dessert for an extra charge). Let’s chat about this next time we meet.

Best regards,
Owner

subject: Action Required: Floor Polishing Days
content:
Hello Manager,

Considering the guidelines I've provided for plant watering and floor polishing,
I need you to determine the two days when we can schedule floor polishing.

Your prompt response is appreciated.

Thank you,
Owner
